 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁשׁ‎</span>] **verb** ==feel, grope== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** Pi\`el; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***feel***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>166</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁשׁ‎</span> Pa\`el, Palpel — see also  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ימשׁ‎</span>, II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מושׁ‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמֻשֵּׁנִי‎</span> [[Gen.27.12|Gen 27:12]] perhaps my father ***will feel me***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמֻשֵּׁהוּ‎</span> v[[Gen.27.22|Gen 27:22]] ***and he felt of him*** (both [[BDB#J|J]]). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשַּׁשְׁתָּ‎</span>; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַשֵּׁשׁ‎</span> [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמַשֵּׁשׁ‎</span> [[Gen.31.34|Gen 31:34]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמַשְׁשׁוּ‎</span> [[Job.5.4|Job 5:4]]; [[Job.12.25|Job 12:25]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַשֵּׁשׁ‎</span> [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]] — ***feel over*** or ***through, grope:*** — 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבָּן אֶתכָּֿלהָֿאֹהֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְמ‎</span> [[Gen.31.24|Gen 31:24]] ***and Laban felt through the whole tent*** (i.e. searched it); so (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּלַי‎</span>) v[[Gen.31.37|Gen 31:37]] ***thou hast felt through*** all my possessions (or baggage; both [[BDB#E|E]]). 

**2.** ***grope***, of blind [[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]]b (in simile), periphrase conjectural, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהָיִיתָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמַשֵּׁשׁ‎</span>[[Deut.28.29|Deut 28:29]] a ***and thou shalt become one that gropes*** at noonday (figurative of judicial blindness); compare [[Job.5.14|Job 5:14]]; [[Job.12.25|Job 12:25]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיָמֵשׁ חשֶׁךְ‎</span> [[Exod.10.21|Exod 10:21]] ***that one may feel*** (the) ***darkness***; read also ***Imperative*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲמִשֵׁנִי‎</span> (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎והימשׁני‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ימשׁ‎</span>, p. 413 above) [[Judg.16.26|Judg 16:26]] ***and let me touch*** the pillars (2 accusative) 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁתֶּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁתה‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵת‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מות‎</span>. p 559,1059
